title: Strawberry Watermelon Agua Fresca
directions: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth. If you want, you can strain the pur√©e through a mesh sieve, to strain out any pulpy pieces that didn't get broken up in the blender. Adjust the ingredients to taste.
ingredients: 1 pound diced seedless or seeded watermelon (without rind), about 3-4 cups
8 ounces strawberries, stems removed (about a pint)
